title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia PedestalCheckpoint 0 60>>
<<moveToY Renata PedestalCheckpoint -30 60>>
<<moveToX Mia PedestalCheckpoint 30 60>>
<<moveToX Renata PedestalCheckpoint -20 60>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
[[inspect]]

title: preparetoclimb
body:
Renata: Okay, let's climb!
<<moveToY Renata Mia -20 40>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia 5 40>>
<<moveUp Renata 1 10>>
[[climb]]

title: climb
body:
Renata: Up we go!
<<moveToForeground Renata>>
<<moveUp Renata 15 20>>
<<moveUp Renata 30 60>>
Mia: Ow!
<<faceLeft Renata>>
